actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that tax legislation should not take effect earlier than 90 days after implementing regulations are issued.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that tax legislation should not take effect earlier than 90 days after implementing regulations are issued by the Internal Revenue Service.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that tax legislation should not take effect earlier than 90 days after implementing regulations are issued.
